LanguageData.hzflm.slave_free_by_master_dead: With the death of the master '{master}', the immature worms died out, and '{slave}' was free.
LanguageData.hzflm.slave_free_by_master_dead_wg: With the death of the master '{master}', the worm died and '{slave}' was free, but the previous mental influence continued.
LanguageData.hzflm.slave_slaved_and_worm_growth: The worm has grown enough, that '{slave}' is now loyal to 'master'.
LanguageData.nzflm.slaves_psychic_shock_msg: Due to a minor psychic shock in the brain, {0} was stunned.
LanguageData.nzflm.slaves_psychic_soothe_msg: Due to psychic soothing, part of {0}'s mental state was restored.
LanguageData.nzflm.slaves_psychic_coverage_msg: Due to psychic coverage, {0}'s mind has temporarily been replaced by the worm.
LanguageData.nzflm.slaves_psychic_coverage_remove_msg: {0} has regained control of their body.
LanguageData.hzflm.slave_already_has_worm: The weak larva was killed by the mature worm.
LanguageData.NzFLM.MindWormSlave_GizmoDesc: You can give simple commands to the worm through psychic power.
